page.title: 07 My Religion_Christianity
page.content:
On Sunday we go to church. The time we go to church is between 8.30am and 10.30am. At{church}we sing religious songs and pray to God.
At 10.45 we go into {Sunday School} we have to bring a{bible} with us. After we've read our bibles then we play a game of dressing up as Jesus or his disciples. Then we have to guess who is who. When it is 12.00 we can have a drink of orange,{vimto,}tea, and a biscuit. Then we go home and tell our mums and dads what we have done.
At night we pray to God.
St.Marks
